_namespace_vars.places-size-settlements-city_small-xs: {{multiply symbol-size-factor (multiply places-size-factor (multiply places-size-settlements-factor-xs (multiply places-size-settlements-factor (minus places-size-settlements-max-xs (multiply places-size-settlements-step-xs 2)))))}}

parameters.name: Land (base)
parameters.description: The Land color is primarily used to style the map background and other bare-land features. It also influences admin borders/labels and will be used as a “base” to derive any other undefined map color.
parameters.summary: Map background and other bare-land features, influences admin borders/labels. Also used to derive all map colors if undefined.

parameters.name: Global symbol size
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the size of all symbols (text and icon) in the map, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors at module level.

parameters.name: Free traffic
parameters.summary: Base color for free traffic flow tubes, including outlines.

parameters.name: Minor traffic
parameters.summary: Base color for minor incidents and slow traffic flow tubes, including outlines. Note that patterns and markers won't be influenced.

parameters.name: Moderate traffic
parameters.summary: Base color for moderate incidents and queueing traffic flow tubes, including outlines. Note that patterns and markers won't be influenced.

parameters.name: Major traffic
parameters.summary: Base color for major incidents and stationary traffic flow tubes, including outlines. Note that patterns and markers won't be influenced.

parameters.name: Closed road
parameters.summary: Outline color for closed road tubes. Note that patterns and markers won't be influenced.

parameters.name: Closed road background
parameters.summary: Background color for closed road tubes. Note that patterns and markers won't be influenced.

parameters.name: Generic incident
parameters.summary: Base color for traffic incidents not causing a delay, such as roadworks. Note that patterns and markers won't be influenced.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any feature in this module will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Line width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all lines in this module, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any traffic incident marker will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Symbol size
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the size of traffic incident markers, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Symbol size (ZL<16)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the size of traffic incident markers at zoom levels <16, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Symbol size (ZL16)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the size of traffic incident markers at zoom level 16, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Symbol size (ZL18)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the size of traffic incident markers at zoom level 18, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any traffic incident tube will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Zoom level shift
parameters.summary: A shift in appearance of traffic incident tubes of one or more zoom levels, compared to default values. This can help reduce density of features at certain scales.

parameters.name: Pattern minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any traffic incident pattern will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Tube width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all traffic incidents tubes, compared to the default values. Note that it will be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Tube width relative to road (ZL5)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all traffic incidents tubes at ZL5, compared to the corresponding road class width. E.g. 1 means as wide as the road, 0.5 half of it.

parameters.name: Tube width relative to road (ZL9)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all traffic incidents tubes at ZL9, compared to the corresponding road class width. E.g. 1 means as wide as the road, 0.5 half of it.

parameters.name: Tube width relative to road (ZL13)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all traffic incidents tubes at ZL13, compared to the corresponding road class width. E.g. 1 means as wide as the road, 0.5 half of it.

parameters.name: Tube width relative to road (ZL19)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all traffic incidents tubes at ZL19, compared to the corresponding road class width. E.g. 1 means as wide as the road, 0.5 half of it.

parameters.name: Tube outline width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all traffic incidents tube outlines, compared to the default values. Note that it will be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Tube offset
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the offset from the center line of all traffic incidents tubes, compared to the corresponding road class width. E.g. 1 means at the side of the road, 0.5 halfway from the center.

parameters.name: Tube offset relative to road (ZL5)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the offset from the center line of all traffic incidents tubes at ZL5, compared to the corresponding road class width. E.g. 1 means at the side of the road, 0.5 halfway from the center.

parameters.name: Tube offset relative to road (ZL9)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the offset from the center line of all traffic incidents tubes at ZL9, compared to the corresponding road class width. E.g. 1 means at the side of the road, 0.5 halfway from the center.

parameters.name: Tube offset relative to road (ZL13)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the offset from the center line of all traffic incidents tubes at ZL13, compared to the corresponding road class width. E.g. 1 means at the side of the road, 0.5 halfway from the center.

parameters.name: Tube offset relative to road (ZL19)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the offset from the center line of all traffic incidents tubes at ZL19, compared to the corresponding road class width. E.g. 1 means at the side of the road, 0.5 halfway from the center.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any traffic flow tube will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Zoom level shift
parameters.summary: A shift in appearance of traffic flow tubes of one or more zoom levels, compared to default values. This can help reduce density of features at certain scales.

parameters.name: Pattern minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any traffic flow pattern will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Tube width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all traffic flow tubes, compared to the default values. Note that it will be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Tube width relative to road (ZL5)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all traffic flow tubes at ZL5, compared to the corresponding road class width. E.g. 1 means as wide as the road, 0.5 half of it.

parameters.name: Tube width relative to road (ZL9)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all traffic flow tubes at ZL9, compared to the corresponding road class width. E.g. 1 means as wide as the road, 0.5 half of it.

parameters.name: Tube width relative to road (ZL13)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all traffic flow tubes at ZL13, compared to the corresponding road class width. E.g. 1 means as wide as the road, 0.5 half of it.

parameters.name: Tube width relative to road (ZL19)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all traffic flow tubes at ZL19, compared to the corresponding road class width. E.g. 1 means as wide as the road, 0.5 half of it.

parameters.name: Tube outline width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all traffic flow tube outlines, compared to the default values. Note that it will be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Tube offset
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the offset from the center line of all traffic flow tubes, compared to the corresponding road class width. E.g. 1 means at the side of the road, 0.5 halfway from the center.

parameters.name: Tube offset relative to road (ZL5)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the offset from the center line of all traffic flow tubes at ZL5, compared to the corresponding road class width. E.g. 1 means at the side of the road, 0.5 halfway from the center.

parameters.name: Tube offset relative to road (ZL9)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the offset from the center line of all traffic flow tubes at ZL9, compared to the corresponding road class width. E.g. 1 means at the side of the road, 0.5 halfway from the center.

parameters.name: Tube offset relative to road (ZL13)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the offset from the center line of all traffic flow tubes at ZL13, compared to the corresponding road class width. E.g. 1 means at the side of the road, 0.5 halfway from the center.

parameters.name: Tube offset relative to road (ZL19)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the offset from the center line of all traffic flow tubes at ZL19, compared to the corresponding road class width. E.g. 1 means at the side of the road, 0.5 halfway from the center.

parameters.name: POI Label
parameters.summary: Base color for POI labels. By default it's derived from the Label foundation color

parameters.name: POI Label Outline
parameters.summary: Base color for POI label outlines. By default it's derived from the Label Outline foundation color

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any feature in this module will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Symbol size
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the size of all symbols (text and icons) in this module, compared to the default values. Note that it will be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Symbol padding
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the padding of all symbols in this module, compared to the default values. It can help to control density of features at certain scales.

parameters.name: POI preset
parameters.summary: Determines the type of preset used for POI properties. It will influence filtering and prioritization of POI groups and categories.

parameters.name: Global
parameters.summary: The percentage (expressed from 0 to 1) of POI categories filtered out from the map, starting from those with lower priority. E.g. 0.9 will remove the 10% less important categories from the map.

parameters.name: Automotive
parameters.summary: Enables POIs belonging to the automotive family, e.g. rest areas and fuel/EV charging stations.

parameters.name: Parking
parameters.summary: Enables POIs belonging to the parking family.

parameters.name: Transport
parameters.summary: Enables POIs belonging to the public transport family, e.g. airports and railway stations.

parameters.name: Healthcare
parameters.summary: Enables POIs belonging to the healthcare family, e.g. hospitals and pharmacies.

parameters.name: Lodging
parameters.summary: Enables POIs belonging to the lodging family, e.g. hotels and camping grounds.

parameters.name: Eat & Drink
parameters.summary: Enables POIs belonging to the eat and drink family, e.g. restaurants and bars.

parameters.name: Financial services
parameters.summary: Enables POIs belonging to the finance family, e.g. banks and ATMs.

parameters.name: Shopping & Consumer services
parameters.summary: Enables POIs belonging to the shopping or consumer services family, e.g. shops and supermarkets.

parameters.name: Business
parameters.summary: Enables POIs belonging to the business family, e.g. commercial and industrial areas.

parameters.name: Sport
parameters.summary: Enables POIs belonging to the sport family, e.g. sport centres and gyms.

parameters.name: Leisure
parameters.summary: Enables POIs belonging to the leisure family, e.g. touristic attractions and zoos.

parameters.name: Religion & Mourning
parameters.summary: Enables POIs belonging to the religion and mourning family, e.g. places of worhsip and cemeteries.

parameters.name: Arts & Culture
parameters.summary: Enables POIs belonging to the arts & culture family, e.g. museums and historic buildings.

parameters.name: Outdoor
parameters.summary: Enables POIs belonging to the outdoor family, e.g. parks & recreation facilities.

parameters.name: Protected Areas
parameters.summary: Enables POIs belonging to the protected areas family, e.g. national parks and nature reserves.

parameters.name: Public Services
parameters.summary: Enables POIs belonging to the public services family, e.g. public offices and libraries.

parameters.name: Education
parameters.summary: Enables POIs belonging to the education family, e.g. universities and schools.

parameters.name: Global
parameters.summary: A shift in appearance of all POIs to one or more zoom levels further, compared to default values. This can help reduce density of features at certain scales.

parameters.name: Automotive
parameters.summary: Shifts appearance and priority of POIs belonging to the automotive family, e.g. rest areas and fuel/EV charging stations. Negative values can counterbalance the global setting.

parameters.name: Parking
parameters.summary: Shifts appearance and priority of POIs belonging to the parking family. Negative values can counterbalance the global setting.

parameters.name: Transport
parameters.summary: Shifts appearance and priority of POIs belonging to the public transport family, e.g. airports and railway stations. Negative values can counterbalance the global setting.

parameters.name: Healthcare
parameters.summary: Shifts appearance and priority of POIs belonging to the healthcare family, e.g. hospitals and pharmacies. Negative values can counterbalance the global setting.

parameters.summary: Shifts appearance and priority of POIs belonging to the lodging family, e.g. hotels and camping grounds. Negative values can counterbalance the global setting.

parameters.summary: Shifts appearance and priority of POIs belonging to the eat and drink family, e.g. restaurants and bars. Negative values can counterbalance the global setting.

parameters.name: Financial services
parameters.summary: Shifts appearance and priority of POIs belonging to the finance family, e.g. banks and ATMs. Negative values can counterbalance the global setting.

parameters.name: Shopping & Consumer services
parameters.summary: Shifts appearance and priority of POIs belonging to the shopping or consumer services family, e.g. shops and supermarkets. Negative values can counterbalance the global setting.

parameters.name: Business
parameters.summary: Shifts appearance and priority of POIs belonging to the business family, e.g. commercial and industrial areas. Negative values can counterbalance the global setting.

parameters.name: Sport
parameters.summary: Shifts appearance and priority of POIs belonging to the sport family, e.g. sport centres and gyms. Negative values can counterbalance the global setting.

parameters.name: Leisure
parameters.summary: Shifts appearance and priority of POIs belonging to the leisure family, e.g. touristic attractions and zoos. Negative values can counterbalance the global setting.

parameters.name: Religion & Mourning
parameters.summary: Shifts appearance and priority of POIs belonging to the religion and mourning family, e.g. places of worhsip and cemeteries. Negative values can counterbalance the global setting.

parameters.name: Arts & Culture
parameters.summary: Shifts appearance and priority of POIs belonging to the arts & culture family, e.g. museums and historic buildings. Negative values can counterbalance the global setting.

parameters.name: Outdoor
parameters.summary: Shifts appearance and priority of POIs belonging to the outdoor family, e.g. parks & recreation facilities. Negative values can counterbalance the global setting.

parameters.name: Protected Areas
parameters.summary: Shifts appearance and priority of POIs belonging to the protected areas family, e.g. national parks and nature reserves. Negative values can counterbalance the global setting.

parameters.name: Public Services
parameters.summary: Shifts appearance and priority of POIs belonging to the public services family, e.g. public offices and libraries. Negative values can counterbalance the global setting.

parameters.name: Education
parameters.summary: Shifts appearance and priority of POIs belonging to the education family, e.g. universities and schools. Negative values can counterbalance the global setting.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any POI marker will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Zoom level shift
parameters.summary: A shift in appearance of POI markers of one or more zoom levels, compared to default values. This can help reduce density of features at certain scales.

parameters.name: Symbol size
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the size of POI markers (text and icon), compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Text size (ZL10)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the text size of POI markers at ZL10, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Text size (ZL18)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the text size of POI markers at ZL18, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Icon size (ZL10)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the icon size of POI markers at ZL10, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Icon size (ZL18)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the icon size of POI markers at ZL18, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any POI micro marker will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Zoom level shift
parameters.summary: A shift in appearance of POI micro markers of one or more zoom levels, compared to default values. This can help reduce density of features at certain scales.

parameters.name: Icon size
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the icon size of POI micro markers, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Icon size (ZL15)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the icon size of POI micro markers at ZL15, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Icon size (ZL18)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the icon size of POI micro markers at ZL18, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Capital
parameters.summary: Base color for capital labels. By default it corresponds to the Label foundation color

parameters.name: City
parameters.summary: Base color for city labels. By default it's derived from the Label foundation color

parameters.name: Town
parameters.summary: Base color for town labels. By default it's derived from the Label foundation color

parameters.name: Village
parameters.summary: Base color for village labels. By default it's derived from the Label foundation color

parameters.name: Neighbourhood
parameters.summary: Base color for neighbourhood labels. By default it's derived from the Label foundation color

parameters.name: Country name
parameters.summary: Base color for country labels. By default it's derived from the Land foundation color and influenced by Label

parameters.name: State name
parameters.summary: Base color for state labels. By default it's derived from the Land foundation color and influenced by Label

parameters.name: Address Point
parameters.summary: Base color for address point labels. By default it's derived from the Label foundation color

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any feature in this module will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Symbol size
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the size of all symbols (text and icons) in this module, compared to the default values. Note that it will be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any city center will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Maximum zoom level
parameters.summary: The maximum zoom level at which any city center will be visualized. Note that certain features can still disappear earlier.

parameters.name: Zoom level shift
parameters.summary: A shift in appearance of city center of one or more zoom levels earlier or later, compared to default values. This can help reduce or increase density of features at certain scales.

parameters.name: Text size
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the text size of city centers, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Text size (ZL3)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the text size of city centers at ZL3, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Text size (ZL8)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the text size of city centers at ZL8, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Text size (ZL15)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the text size of city centers at ZL15, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Text size difference between label classes (ZL3)
parameters.summary: A pixel value for the difference in text sizes between city centers classes at ZL3, compared to the default values. This can help reduce or increase differentation of features.

parameters.name: Text size difference between label classes (ZL8)
parameters.summary: A pixel value for the difference in text sizes between city centers classes at ZL8, compared to the default values. This can help reduce or increase differentation of features.

parameters.name: Text size difference between label classes (ZL15)
parameters.summary: A pixel value for the difference in text sizes between city centers classes at ZL15, compared to the default values. This can help reduce or increase differentation of features.

parameters.name: Icon maximum zoom level
parameters.summary: The maximum zoom level at which any city center icons will be visualized. Note that the label will be centered once the icon disappears.

parameters.name: Icon size
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the icon size of city centers, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Icon size (ZL3)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the icon size of city centers at ZL3, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Icon size (ZL8)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the icon size of city centers at ZL3, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any administrative label will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Maximum zoom level
parameters.summary: The maximum zoom level at which any administrative label will be visualized. Note that certain features can still disappear ealier.

parameters.name: Zoom level shift
parameters.summary: A shift in appearance of administrative labels of one or more zoom levels earlier or later, compared to default values. This can help reduce or increase density of features at certain scales.

parameters.name: State code maximum zoom level
parameters.summary: The maximum zoom level at which any state codes will be visualized. State names will be visualized instead after this ZL.

parameters.name: Text size
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the text size of administrative labels, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Text size (ZL4)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the text size of administrative labels at ZL4, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Text size (ZL8)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the text size of administrative labels at ZL8, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any address point will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Text size
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the text size of address points, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Text size (ZL18)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the text size of address points at ZL18, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Text size (ZL20)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the text size of address points at ZL20, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Country border
parameters.summary: Base color for country borders. By default it is derived from the Land foundation color and influenced by Label

parameters.name: State border
parameters.summary: Base color for state borders. By default it is derived from the Land foundation color and influenced by Label

parameters.name: Treaty border
parameters.summary: Base color for treaty borders. By default it is derived from an hardcoded color and influenced by country borders

parameters.name: Disputed border
parameters.summary: Base color for disputed borders. By default it is derived from an hardcoded color and influenced by country borders

parameters.name: Maritime border
parameters.summary: Base color for maritime borders. By default it is derived from the Water foundation color and influenced by country borders

parameters.name: Border outline
parameters.summary: Base color for country borders. By default it corresponds to the Label Outline foundation color

parameters.name: Line width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all lines in this module, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Text size
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the size of all text labels in this module, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Road label
parameters.summary: Base color for road name labels, including text in route shields. By default it is derived from the Label foundation color and influenced by road colors.

parameters.name: Road label outline
parameters.summary: Base color for road name label outlines. By default it is derived from the Label Outline foundation color with additional transparency.

parameters.name: Motorway
parameters.summary: Base color for motorways. By default it corresponds to the Major Road foundation color.

parameters.name: Trunk
parameters.summary: Base color for trunk roads. By default it is derived from the Major Road foundation color and influenced by the Road color.

parameters.name: Primary road
parameters.summary: Base color for primary roads. By default it is derived from the Major Road foundation color and influenced by the Road color.

parameters.name: Secondary road
parameters.summary: Base color for secondary roads. By default it corresponds to the Road foundation color.

parameters.name: Tertiary road
parameters.summary: Base color for tertiary roads. By default it corresponds to the Road foundation color.

parameters.name: Residential road
parameters.summary: Base color for residential and local roads. By default it is derived from the Road foundation color.

parameters.name: Minor road
parameters.summary: Base color for minor and service roads. By default it is derived from the Road foundation color.

parameters.name: Road tarmac
parameters.summary: Base color for detailed road areas. By default it is derived from the Major Road foundation color and influenced by the Road color.

parameters.name: Pedestrian road
parameters.summary: Base color for pedestrian roads. By default it is derived from the Road foundation color and influenced by the Road Outline color.

parameters.name: Restricted road
parameters.summary: Base color for restricted roads, including bus/tram ways and private roads. By default it is derived from the pedestrian road color.

parameters.name: Pedestrian area
parameters.summary: Base color for pedestrian areas. By default it is derived from the Land foundation color and influenced by the Road Outline color.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any feature in this module will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Zoom level shift
parameters.summary: A shift in appearance of road features of one or more zoom levels earlier or later, compared to default values. This can help reduce or increase density of features at certain scales.

parameters.name: Use driving style assets
parameters.summary: Use assets tailored to driving style roads for features such as exit shields and turning features.

parameters.name: Fade roads at high zoom levels
parameters.summary: Progressively fade road lines and outlines at higher zoom levels. This can help visualize satellite-based styles correctly.

parameters.name: Symbol size
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the size of all symbols (text and icon) in this module, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any exit number will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Symbol size
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the size of exit numbers shields (text and icon), compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Symbol size (ZL15)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the size of exit numbers shields at ZL15, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Symbol size (ZL17)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the size of exit numbers shields at ZL17, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any route shield will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Symbol size
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the size of route shields (text and icon), compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Symbol size (ZL10)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the size of route shields at ZL10, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Symbol size (ZL12)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the size of route shields at ZL12, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any road label will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Text size
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the text size of road labels, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Text size (ZL10)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the text size of road labels at ZL10, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Text size (ZL18)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the text size of road labels at ZL18, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any road arrow will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any restricted road symbology will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Restricted road dash width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of restricted roads dashed lines, compared to the default values. Note that it won't be affected by other width factors.

parameters.name: Road width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all road lines, compared to the default values. Note that it will be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Road width change rate
parameters.summary: A factor to control the rate of change for road widths between zoom levels. 1 is linear, 2 is exponential (delayed increase).

parameters.name: Road width (ZL5)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of road lines at ZL5, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Road width (ZL9)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of road lines at ZL9, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Road width (ZL13)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of road lines at ZL13, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Road width (ZL19)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of road lines at ZL19, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Major roads width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of major road lines at all zoom levels, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Secondary roads width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of secondary road lines at all zoom levels, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Local roads width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of local road lines at all zoom levels, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Minor roads width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of minor road lines at all zoom levels, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Width difference between road classes (ZL5)
parameters.summary: A pixel value for the difference in line width between road classes at ZL5, compared to the default values. This can help reduce or increase differentation of features.

parameters.name: Width difference between road classes (ZL9)
parameters.summary: A pixel value for the difference in line width between road classes at ZL9, compared to the default values. This can help reduce or increase differentation of features.

parameters.name: Width difference between road classes (ZL13)
parameters.summary: A pixel value for the difference in line width between road classes at ZL13, compared to the default values. This can help reduce or increase differentation of features.

parameters.name: Width difference between road classes (ZL19)
parameters.summary: A pixel value for the difference in line width between road classes at ZL19, compared to the default values. This can help reduce or increase differentation of features.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any road outline will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Road outline width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all road outlines, compared to the default values. Note that it will not affect inline width.

parameters.name: Road outline width (ZL5)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of road outlines at ZL5, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Road outline width (ZL9)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of road outlines at ZL9, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Road outline width (ZL13)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of road outlines at ZL13, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Road outline width (ZL19)
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of road outlines at ZL19, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Major roads outline width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of major road outlines at all zoom levels, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Secondary roads outline width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of secondary road outlines at all zoom levels, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Local roads outline width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of local road outlines at all zoom levels, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Minor roads outline width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of minor road outlines at all zoom levels, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Outline width difference between road groups (ZL9)
parameters.summary: A pixel value for the difference in outline width between road classes at ZL5, compared to the default values. This can help reduce or increase differentation of features.

parameters.name: Outline width difference between road groups (ZL13)
parameters.summary: A pixel value for the difference in outline width between road classes at ZL13, compared to the default values. This can help reduce or increase differentation of features.

parameters.name: Outline width difference between road groups (ZL19)
parameters.summary: A pixel value for the difference in outline width between road classes at ZL19, compared to the default values. This can help reduce or increase differentation of features.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any tarmac outline will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Tarmac outline width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all tarmac outlines, compared to the default values. Note that it will not be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Tarmac outline change rate
parameters.summary: A factor to control the rate of change for tarmac outline widths between zoom levels. 1 is linear, 2 is exponential (delayed increase).

parameters.name: Path
parameters.summary: Base color for paths. By default it is derived from the Road foundation color and influenced by Road Outline.

parameters.name: Track
parameters.summary: Base color for tracks. By default it is derived from the Road foundation color and influenced by Road Outline.

parameters.name: Paths label
parameters.summary: Base color for track and path name labels, including text in route shields. By default it is derived from the Label foundation color and influenced by path and track colors.

parameters.name: Paths label outline
parameters.summary: Base color for track and path name label outlines. By default it is derived from the Label Outline foundation color with additional transparency.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any feature in this module will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Zoom level shift
parameters.summary: A shift in appearance of road features of one or more zoom levels earlier or later, compared to default values. This can help reduce or increase density of features at certain scales.

parameters.name: Line width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all lines in this module, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Text size
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the size of all text labels in this module, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Track width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all track lines, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Path width
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the width of all path lines, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other width factors.

parameters.name: Ferries
parameters.summary: Base color for ferry lines and labels. By default it is derived from the Water foundation color and influenced by Artificial.

parameters.name: Inherit colors from Transport POI group
parameters.summary: Generate colors for transport features from the corresponding POI group assets. With the option off, features are only derived from the Artificial foundation color

parameters.name: Railways
parameters.summary: Base color for all railways, including tram and subway lines. By default it is derived from the Artificial foundation color.

parameters.name: Aeroways
parameters.summary: Base color for runways and other aeroway features. By default it is derived from the Artificial foundation color.

parameters.name: Platforms
parameters.summary: Base color for public transit platforms. By default it is derived from the Artificial foundation color.

parameters.name: Aerialways
parameters.summary: Base color for cableway lines and other aerial transit features. By default it is derived from the Artificial foundation color.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any feature in this module will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Text size
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the size of all text labels in this module, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which aerialways will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which aerialways will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which aeroways will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which railways will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Tunnel maximum zoom level
parameters.summary: The maximum zoom level at which railway tunnels and subway lines will be visualized. Note that certain features can still disappear earlier.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which ferries will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Building extrusion
parameters.summary: Base color for building extrusions. By default it is derived from the Artificial foundation color.

parameters.name: Building footprint
parameters.summary: Base color for building footprints. By default it is derived from the Artificial foundation color.

parameters.name: Building outline
parameters.summary: Base color for building outlines. By default it is derived from the Building footprint color.

parameters.name: Building shadow
parameters.summary: Base color for building shadows. By default it is derived from the Building footprint color.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any feature in this module will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Extrusion opacity
parameters.summary: The transparency value of extruded buildings. 1 is fully opaque, 0.5 is half transparent.

parameters.name: Underground footprints
parameters.summary: Visualize underground buildings with half-transparent footprint

parameters.name: Building faux shadow
parameters.summary: Visualize faux 2d shadow along building footprints

parameters.name: Building outline
parameters.summary: Visualize perimeter outline along building footprints

parameters.name: Water label
parameters.summary: Base color for water labels. By default it is derived from the Water foundation color and not influenced by Label color

parameters.name: Water label outline
parameters.summary: Base color for water label outlines. By default it is derived from the Water foundation color and not influenced by Label outline color

parameters.name: Waterbody
parameters.summary: Base color for waterbodies, including oceans and seas. By default it matches the Water foundation color.

parameters.name: Waterway
parameters.summary: Base color for waterways, including artificial canals. By default it matches the Water foundation color.

parameters.name: Ice
parameters.summary: Base color for glaciers and permament snow-covered areas. By default it is derived from the Water foundation color.

parameters.name: Text size
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the text size of all water labels, compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Waterway minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any waterway label be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Intermittent waterbodies
parameters.summary: Visualize intermittent or seasonal waterbodies with semi-transparent area

parameters.name: Intermittent minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any intermittent waterbody be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Waterbody faux shadow
parameters.summary: Visualize faux 2d shadow along waterbodies to simulate depth.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any waterway will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Hillshade
parameters.summary: Base color for shaded terrain. By default it matches the Land foundation color.

parameters.name: Hillshade shadow
parameters.summary: Base color for hillshade shadow areas. By default it is derived from Hillshade color. Use alpha value to increase or decrease opacity.

parameters.name: Hillshade highlight
parameters.summary: Base color for hillshade highlight areas. By default it is derived from Hillshade color. Use alpha value to increase or decrease opacity.

parameters.name: Hillshade accent
parameters.summary: Base color for hillshade accent areas. By default it is derived from Hillshade color. Use alpha value to increase or decrease opacity.

parameters.name: Maximum zoom level
parameters.summary: The maximum zoom level at which the hillshade will be visualized. Note that the hillshade effect will be automatically faded up to this ZL.

parameters.name: Hillshade exaggeration
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which satellite imagery will be visualized.

parameters.name: Maximum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which satellite imagery will be visualized.

parameters.name: Opacity
parameters.summary: The opacity of the satellite imagery layer. Note that this might not be supported in certain applications.

parameters.name: Built-up area
parameters.summary: Base color for built-up areas. By default it matches the Artificial foundation color.

parameters.name: Landuse ground
parameters.summary: Base color for all landuse grounds, except protected areas and outdoor/sport ground. By default it is derived from the Artificial foundation color.

parameters.name: Protected area
parameters.summary: Base color for all protected areas, including national parks and natural reserves. By default it is derived from the Park & Recreation foundation color.

parameters.name: Park ground
parameters.summary: Base color for all city parks and outdoor related facilities. By default it matches the Park & Recreation foundation color.

parameters.name: Sport ground
parameters.summary: Base color for all sport grounds and facilities. By default it is derived the Park & Recreation foundation color.

parameters.name: Inherit colors from POI groups
parameters.summary: Generate colors for landuse grounds from the corresponding POI group assets. With the option off, features are only derived from the Landuse ground color

parameters.name: Fill maximum zoom level
parameters.summary: The maximum zoom level at which any protected areas will be visualized with a partially transparent polygon. Note that certain features can still fade out earlier.

parameters.name: Outline minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any protected areas will be visualized with a partially transparent outline. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any artificial structure will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any landuse facility will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any landuse ground will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any built-up area will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Woodland
parameters.summary: Base color for forests and woodland areas. By default it corresponds to the Vegetation foundation color.

parameters.name: Grassland
parameters.summary: Base color for gardens and grassland areas. By default it is derived by the Vegetation foundation color.

parameters.name: Cropland
parameters.summary: Base color for agricultural and cropland areas. By default it is derived by the Vegetation foundation color.

parameters.name: Shrubland
parameters.summary: Base color for heath and shrubland areas. By default it is derived by the Vegetation foundation color.

parameters.name: Sand
parameters.summary: Base color for beaches and sandy areas. By default it is derived by the Land foundation color.

parameters.name: Bareland
parameters.summary: Base color for rocky and bareland areas. By default it is derived by the Land foundation color.

parameters.name: Background
parameters.summary: Base color for the background of the map. By default it matches the Land foundation color.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any natural label will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Symbol size
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the size of all natural symbols (text and icon), compared to the default values. Note that it can be combined with other size factors.

parameters.name: Minimum zoom level
parameters.summary: The minimum zoom level at which any land cover area will be visualized. Note that certain features can still appear later.

parameters.name: Maximum zoom level
parameters.summary: The maximum zoom level at which any earth cover area will be visualized. Note that certain features can still disappear earlier.

parameters.name: Opacity factor
parameters.summary: A multiplication factor for the additional opacity applied to earth cover layer. Note that it will also influence fading of all earth cover categories at large scale.

2.0.8-2.title: Version 2.0.8-2
description: added missing 'schema:version' to the street-light-driving

2.0.8-1.title: Version 2.0.8-1
description: fix incorrect user-order

2.0.8-0.title: Version 2.0.8-0
description: updated UI definition to make use of parameter groups
exposed POI presets with updated filtering and prioritization logic
updated definition to use 0.4.* sprite assets
fixes for LLV, routing and anti-occlusion features
updates to places order and logic
updated default layer order

2.0.7-0.title: Version 2.0.7-0
description: updated PMD customization parameters and added bloom properties
added PMD optimization settings for selected layers
added options for PMD material customization for specific modules
updated 3d extrusion/landmark logic and filters
updated POI filter/priority logic and text offset behavior
updated icon customization logic

2.0.6-1.title: Version 2.0.6-1
description: added PMD sky options
improved font logic

2.0.6-0.title: Version 2.0.6-0
description: added LLV layers
restructured layer order and group naming
added PMD metadata and properties
added routing&navigation module/sources

2.0.5-6.title: Version 2.0.5-6
description: updated traffic source and parameters

2.0.5-5.title: Version 2.0.5-5
description: removed PMD specific layers from user-order
improve color logic for tertiary roads and streets
amend definition of path labels

2.0.5-4.title: Version 2.0.5-4
description: updated POI layers definition
fixed wrong parameter for POI markers ZL offset

2.0.5-3.title: Version 2.0.5-3
description: updated theme:version and theme:flavor properties

2.0.5-2.title: Version 2.0.5-2
description: fixed expressions for certain color parameters
fixed filter for browsing POI categories
updated user-order to include PMD-specific layers

2.0.5-1.title: Version 2.0.5-1
description: updated hillshade and satellite tile sources to new Orbis endpoints
fixed metadata properties and colors for anti-occlusion layers (PMD only)
restored tooltips for all UI parameters, including Foundations

user-order: Surface - Major road small scale outline

layers.id: Surface - Major road small scale outline
